snippet: Throngs of Giants fans lined barricades in Manhattan on Tuesday for the parade honoring the team.
abstract: Throngs of Giants fans lined barricades in Manhattan on Tuesday for the parade honoring the team.
lead_paragraph: 3:02 p.m. | Updated At a ceremony on Tuesday afternoon to celebrate their Super Bowl championship, Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg presented the Giants with keys to the city.

headline.main: For the Giants, a Parade, Keys to the City, and a Day Full of Cheers
